metadata.title: CVE-2023-1417 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from15.9 before 15.9.4, all versions starting from 15.10 before 15.10.1. It waspossible for an unauthorised user to add child epics linked to victim'sepic in an unrelated group.

criterions.comment: gitlab-agent package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
